alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:08PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pickens and northwestern Greene Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Deerbrook to near Paulette. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Pickensville, Memphis, McMullen, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Bevill Lock And Dam, Garden, Mantua, Jena, Snoddy, Dillburg, George Downer Airport, Kirk, Pleasant Ridge, Lewiston and Gainesville Lake Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
